GreenValueHost is the web hosting industry's #1 "budget premium" hosting provider, specializing in providing our clients with high quality and affordable hosting solutions in 6 of our world class data center locations (Buffalo, Chicago, Dallas, Los Angeles, Seattle, and Amsterdam).

We are a privately owned hosting company (Green Value Hosting, Inc) registered in the U.S. state of Illinois since October, 2012. We host tens of thousands of websites from thousands of clients around the world, and we would love to have the opportunity of serving you!
